name: Marshadow
flavorText: Able to conceal itself in shadows, it never appears before humans, so its very existence was the stuff of myth.

attacks.name: Shadowy Echoes
attacks.text: Put a Basic Pokémon from each player's discard pile onto its owner's Bench.

attacks.name: Surprise Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
